questions.question: What CSS feature adapts styles to different screen sizes?
questions.explanation: Media queries apply conditional styles based on device.

questions.question: What meta tag controls mobile viewport scaling?
questions.explanation: The viewport meta tag manages mobile display.

questions.question: What unit represents percentage of viewport width?
questions.explanation: vw units scale with viewport width.

questions.question: What unit represents percentage of viewport height?
questions.explanation: vh units scale with viewport height.
